featured.text: When Jeffery doesn’t feel like cooking, he often orders pizza online and has it ______ to his house.
Raised in California, Whitfield began performing in public at age 18, when she took a job as a singing waitress at a pizza parlor.
“He would deliberate before eating even a slice of pizza because it has 350 calories,” the mother said.

definition.zh_def: 比薩，一種圓形的意大利食品，通常由發酵麵團製成，上面放有番茄醬、奶酪和各種配料。
definition.en_def: Pizza, a round Italian dish typically made from leavened dough topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and various toppings.
definition.example: I ordered a pepperoni pizza for dinner.
